comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I'll hound it this afternoon. HUMN sounds like a great meeting place

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm a hound - there's abundant evidence to support this - but I'm dog tired and feeling unusually heat-averse today. I'm gonna' pass F&H and go directly to the Toad. Ronna will be with me. DU

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Oh Boy! FAC - my favorite acronym! See ya' then/there, DU

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: Any other hounds out there? If so, how about we meet at Humanities at 5 pm? -Kevin

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Sorry to have missed this. I was in an SUV with the family headed across the desolate plains of Kansas to visit in-laws. Hope I can join next time.
